summary: Completed testing of 'Realizar' functionality for work orders. Backend API fully functional, frontend authentication issues prevent UI testing.

ui_bugs.issue: Login form submission not working properly - stays on login page after valid credentials

integration_issues.issue: Frontend authentication not working - cannot access protected routes after login

passed_tests: Order status updates correctly in database
All required form fields present in WorkOrderDetail.jsx component
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication - login form submission not working. Users cannot access the application after entering valid credentials. The backend API is fully functional, but frontend login flow needs debugging.
